title: OTA system updates will not work over WiFi
content:
Hi
I have a Pixel 5 on EE (UK)
OTA system updates only seem to work for me if I disconnect WiFi and use mobile data.
If I look for a system update over wifi it says I'm up to date.
If I turn off wifi, it detects the OTA update but then it says "Download Paused" with a warning about "Downloading updates over a mobile network, metered Wi-Fi or while roaming may cause additional charges"
I then turn on wifi, and it says "System update, update available" in the System menu
If I go into this, I just get the above "download Paused" message constantly, even after clicking "Resume"
